name: Merkle Tree Root
description: A program that computes the Merkle tree root corresponding to a set of transactions using SHA-256.
requirements: The program must output the Merkle root.
SHA-256 must be used to perform the hashing at each step, you may use a library for this.
The code must be tested and documented.

input.name: transactions.txt
input.description: A file containing hexadecimal transaction hashes, one per line.

output.name: Merkle root
output.description: The Merkle root in hexadecimal format.

testing.description: A script that generates a random set of transactions, computes the Merkle root using both the implemented code and a reference implementation, and verifies that the results match.

documentation.description: The code is documented using GoDoc comments.
